description.value: Primary Energy: Air 2 (slowing fall with updraft) Supporting Energy: Space 5 (close range + 5 creatures + up to 1 minute) Range: Close, 30 ft. Duration: Up to 1 minute (until they land) Total Cost: 7 Energy Action: [Reaction] when you or creature within close range falls Weaving Roll: Air Potential + Air Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Up to 5 falling creatures within close range descend 60 feet per round and take no falling damage. Weave lasts until they land (up to 1 minute). Saving Throw: None (beneficial effect) Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 creature, 2 = 5 creatures, 3 = 10 creatures, 4 = can cast as [Free] reaction without spending action
